The rumor was not based on any official: but rather on a single innocuous headline published by the Swedish newspaper Sydsvenskan.
The Swedish news outlet used the term: vinterfirandet" (winter celebration) in the headline, but variations of the word "Julen" (Christmas) were used repeatedly in the article itself.
Other articles published by Sydsvenskan: Julen) section with articles about various Christmas-related topics.
The official website of the Swedish gove: including one page full of Christmas references, indicating that Christmas is celebrated in Sweden.
